title: CYP11B3
text:
The Cyp11b3 is a <a href="rat">rat</a> <a href="gene">gene</a> encoding a <a href="CYP450">CYP450</a> <a href="enzyme">enzyme</a>, which is mainly expressed in <a href="neonatal">neonatal</a> rat <a href="adrenal">adrenal</a>s, and also expressed in a small amount in other organs of adult rats, this enzyme mainly catalyzing <a href="11-Deoxycorticosterone">11-Deoxycorticosterone</a> (DOC) to <a href="18-Hydroxy-11-deoxycorticosterone">18-Hydroxy-11-deoxycorticosterone</a> (18-OH-DOC).
Cyp11b3 gene is also located at <a href="Chromosome">Chromosome</a> 7q34, next to rat <a href="CYP11B1">CYP11B1</a> and <a href="CYP11B2">CYP11B2</a>.
